name: keka

description.integration: Keka is a modern HR and payroll management software designed to streamline workforce operations such as attendance, leave tracking, employee performance management, and payroll processing.

documentation: # Keka Use the Keka integration to perform various operations such as creating a employee, updating job and personal details of an employee, and more. To do this, you'll need to create a new Keka account. You can find the detailed instructions to create an Keka API application in the Sign Up for Keka. ## Prerequisites To use the Keka node, you need to have an Keka account. After creating an account you will provided with client id, client secret and api key. ## Supported Authentication Methods - Access Token ## Basic Operations ### Employees - Get all employees - Create employee - Get employee by id - Get all updated fields - Update employee personal details - Update employee job details ### Leaves - Get all leave types - Get all leave balances - Get all leave requests - Create leave request - Get all leave plans ### Attendance - Get all attendance records - Get all capture schemes - Get all shift policies - Get all holiday calendars - Get all tracking policies - Get all weekly off policies

ai_description.integration: Keka is used in automation workflows to manage HR and payroll tasks efficiently, such as tracking attendance, managing employee records, processing payroll, and handling leave requests, with operations including retrieving attendance records, managing employee data, and processing leave requests, making it ideal for streamlining workforce management processes.
